text: Ezo (ngelosi) zithwala iTrone nezo ziyingqongileyo zizukisa (uAllâh) ngendumiso yeNkosi yazo yaye ziyakholwa kuYe zicelela noxolo abo bakholwayo, (zisithi): “Nkosi yethu Wena Ugubungele izinto zonke ngenceba yakho nolwazi, xolela abo baguqukileyo, balandela iNdlela yaKho, Ubakhusele kananjalo kwisohlwayo soMlilo wesiHogo
